name: Electronic Sweet-N-Fun Fortune Teller
description:
Electronic Sweet-N-Fun Fortune Teller is an original love horoscope game programmed for play on the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). The game is 40 KB and was written in 6502 assembly by Rachel Simone Weil, aka Party Time! Hexcellent! Download includes NES ROM, a readme.txt, and a four-page booklet about hacking, programming, and sleepovers entitled "Do Fun Things with Electronic Sweet-N-Fun Fortune Teller."

HOW TO PLAY

To play Electronic Sweet-N-Fun Fortune Teller on your Windows, Mac, or Linux machine (and possibly others), simply open it in one of the many freely available NES emulators. Electronic Sweet-N-Fun Fortune Teller can also be played on a real NES! Simply copy the ROM onto a PowerPak cartridge (available from retrousb.com), place the cart into your NES, and play to your heart's content. Or, if you're so inclined, you can burn and solder your own custom NES cartridge.

CONTROLS

Up/down: Cycle through letters, days, or months

Left/right: Move left/right on name entry screens

B: Confirm and go to next line

A: Go back one line

NES EMULATOR REQUIRED FOR PLAY ON COMPUTER.
